thread.title: Couples choose Valentine's Day to marry at the registrar's office - LA Times
thread.title_full: Couples choose Valentine's Day to marry at the registrar's office - LA Times

author: Esmeralda Bermudez
title: Couples choose Valentine's Day to marry at the registrar's office - LA Times
text:
Couples choose Valentine's Day to marry at the registrar's office valentine's weddingd Luis Sinco / Los Angeles Times Stephine Gaston and Jerry Tyler kiss at the conclusion of their Valentine's Day wedding at the L.A. County Registrar's office in Norwalk. Stephine Gaston and Jerry Tyler kiss at the conclusion of their Valentine's Day wedding at the L.A. County Registrar's office in Norwalk. (Luis Sinco / Los Angeles Times) Esmeralda Bermudez Caption 90 seconds: 4 stories you can't miss 
Trump's national security advisor Michael Flynn resigns , officials work frantically to drain water from Lake Oroville , Congress has been busy writing bills , and federal officials say they haven't broadened the scope of immigration enforcement raids . Caption 90 seconds: 4 stories you can't miss
